product_desc:
Obscura is an artistic inspired, socially driven, high-quality photo sharing platform.

Obscura's mission is to create a social feed to share artistic content with friends, family and others. Users will actively create their own unique, recognizable style as there is no "like" pressure when posting photos. Users will learn and be inspired from the editorials, interviews, and tips of geo-local photographers.

Obscura's growth plan: "Wish for A Camera" - this module will document the stories of benefactors whom have applied for the program. Tell us why you would like a DSLR camera and tripod, e.g. what does photography mean to you. We will tell your story to geo-local users.

Obscura's transformative growth plan and revenue model: available upon interview. 

Target users: All social media users. Too broad? We don't think so. We believe everyone has an artistic side which is constricted by existing social media platforms.
name: Obscura
